- v represents a [vortex](/wiki/Vortex "Vortex"):

  - v [fog cloud](/wiki/Fog_cloud "Fog cloud")
  - v [dust vortex](/wiki/Dust_vortex "Dust vortex")
  - v [ice vortex](/wiki/Ice_vortex "Ice vortex")
  - v [energy vortex](/wiki/Energy_vortex "Energy vortex")
  - v [steam vortex](/wiki/Steam_vortex "Steam vortex")
  - v [fire vortex](/wiki/Fire_vortex "Fire vortex")

* V represents a [vampire](/wiki/Vampire "Vampire"):

  - V [vampire](/wiki/Vampire "Vampire")
  - V [vampire lord](/wiki/Vampire_lord "Vampire lord")
  - V [Vlad the Impaler](/wiki/Vlad_the_Impaler "Vlad the Impaler")

- Press [v]() to see the game [version](/wiki/Version "Version").
- Press [shift](/wiki/Shift "Shift") + [v]() to see the game history.
- In [AceHack](/wiki/AceHack "AceHack"), [DynaHack](/wiki/DynaHack "DynaHack"), [FIQhack](/wiki/FIQhack "FIQhack"), [Fourk](/wiki/Fourk "Fourk"), [NetHack4](/wiki/NetHack4 "NetHack4"), or [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), press [v]() to [autoexplore](/wiki/Autoexplore "Autoexplore").
- In [AceHack](/wiki/AceHack "AceHack"), [DynaHack](/wiki/DynaHack "DynaHack"), [FIQhack](/wiki/FIQhack "FIQhack"), [Fourk](/wiki/Fourk "Fourk"), or [NetHack4](/wiki/NetHack4 "NetHack4"), press [shift](/wiki/Shift "Shift") + [v]() to [invoke](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke"), [rub](/wiki/Rub "Rub"), [break](/wiki/Wand#breaking_wands "Wand") an item, or ignite a [potion of oil](/wiki/Potion_of_oil "Potion of oil").

## SLASH'EM

[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") introduces new creatures that use the V glyph:

- V vampire:

  - V [fire vampire](/wiki/Fire_vampire "Fire vampire")
  - V [star vampire](/wiki/Star_vampire "Star vampire")
  - V [vampire mage](/wiki/Vampire_mage_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Vampire mage (SLASH'EM)")
  - V [Count Dracula](/wiki/Count_Dracula "Count Dracula")

## Other

- v [Anti-matter vortex](/wiki/Anti-matter_vortex "Anti-matter vortex") - appears in [NetHack brass](/wiki/NetHack_brass "NetHack brass") and older versions of [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack")
html:
V

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Printable ASCII characters
~ ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ + space
` 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0 - = { } |
Qq Ww Ee Rr Tt Yy Uu Ii Oo Pp : " [ ] \
Aa Ss Dd Ff Gg Hh Jj Kk Ll ? ; ' Ctrl
Zz Xx Cc Vv Bb Nn Mm , . / < > Alt
  • v represents a vortex:
    • v fog cloud
    • v dust vortex
    • v ice vortex
    • v energy vortex
    • v steam vortex
    • v fire vortex
  • V represents a vampire:
    • V vampire
    • V vampire lord
    • V Vlad the Impaler
  • Press v to see the game version.
  • Press shift + v to see the game history.
  • In AceHack, DynaHack, FIQhack, Fourk, NetHack4, or UnNetHack, press v to autoexplore.
  • In AceHack, DynaHack, FIQhack, Fourk, or NetHack4, press shift + v to invoke, rub, break an item, or ignite a potion of oil.

SLASH'EM

SLASH'EM introduces new creatures that use the V glyph:

  • V vampire:
    • V fire vampire
    • V star vampire
    • V vampire mage
    • V Count Dracula

Other

  • v Anti-matter vortex - appears in NetHack brass and older versions of UnNetHack
